snippet.title: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord - War Sails - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Conquer the Waves, Claim Your Destiny! We’re thrilled to announce War Sails, a major expansion for Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord, launching on PC, Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5 on June 17, 2025!

Watch the announcement trailer to get a first look at the intense naval warfare and epic battles that await.

Check out the full announcement where you can learn more about the expansion as well as plans for the base game - https://www.taleworlds.com/en/News/572

Wishlist Now on Steam to stay updated and be ready to set sail on launch day! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2927200/Mount__Blade_II_Bannerlord__War_Sails/

Follow us on social media:
X/Twitter:  https://x.com/Mount_and_Blade
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/mountandblade
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mountandbladegame/
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/mountandblade.taleworlds.com
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mountandbladeofficial
